title: bash .profile breaks test/run
body:
by **robert.c.nix**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. hg update release
2. ./all.bash

1. hg pull -u
2. ./all.bash

What is the expected output?
ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for linux/amd64 in /home/you/go.
Installed commands in /home/you/go/bin.
*** You need to add /home/you/go/bin to your $PATH. ***
The compiler is 6g.

What do you see instead?
--- cd ../test
fail: ./cmplxdivide1.go
19a20,21
> =========== ./cmplxdivide1.go
> 
1 known bugs; 0 unexpected bugs; test output differs
FAILED


Which operating system are you using?

Linux rnix-lnx 2.6.18-238.9.1.0.1.el5 #1 SMP Tue Apr 12 19:16:55 EDT 2011 i686 i686 i386
GNU/Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

9d7967223815 (release-branch.r57) release.r57.2/release

Thanks
